name: Felt Rose Necklace/Lariat/Headpiece Hand Felted-From Wool- in Peach Shade
description:
This gorgeous one of a kind hand-felted chain is decorated with a beautiful rose.Each petal and leaves are hand crafted from the finest, luxuriously soft  merino wool.We hand dyed and carded the merino wool. You can let your imagination flow and this flower can hang around your neck,in your hair or use it as a bracelet.

Find more info about wet felting here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felt

More details:This listing is made to order. The rose necklace will ship in about 5 business days from date of purchase, Monday-Friday.

name: White Felt Flower Brooch - Hand Felted From Wool
description:
This is a stunning flower brooch or special occasion hair piece. This flower is very elaborate and eye catching, handmade from the softest merino wool. It is white with a yellow center. This piece has numerous hand felted details.It is securely attached to a silver pin and measures about 5 inches across. Gorgeous!

Find more info about wet felting here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felt

name: Red Poppy-Felt Brooch-Hand Felted From Wool-Size-X Large
description:
This exquisite red poppy brooch is handmade with wet-felting technique from merino wool.This piece is very elaborate and eye catching,made from the softest australian merino wool. It is red in color with black and geen center. This piece has numerous hand felted details.It is securely attached to a silver pin and measures about 5 inches across.
Wherever it's pinned on a jumper, hat, or jacket this hand-felted flower brooch is a real eye catcher. Gorgeous!

More details:This listing is made to order. The Red Poppy Brooch will ship in about 5 business days from date of purchase, Monday-Friday.

Find more info about wet felting here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felt

name: Corinne -Light Grey French Style Beret From Pure Wool With Felted Rose Brooch-Hand Felted-In Coral
description:
This beautiful French style beret is from 100%
pure wool. The embellishment is a handmade flower made with wet felting technique from merino wool. This beret is warm, stylish and can be easily folded into your handbag. Perfect to wear for a walk in the park.So pretty!

Size:one size fits most adults.

name: Lara -Green Shoulder Bag-Hand Felted From Wool With Yellow and Orange Flowers
description:
This cute and unique handbag is wet felted from 100% merino wool and pure silk fibers around a template and therefore has no seams. The color is a combination of green shades.This handmade bag has a beautiful flower detail created from wool and silk fibers, which had been incorporated into the bag during the wet felting process.The flowers have embroidered embellishments from glass beads.The closing is with snap fastener.Handmade felt gives the benefits of being durable (we have used 4 layers of wool), soft and light.

Measurements:H22cm x W23cm,cord:45cm, (8.7 x 9.1 ,cord:17.7 inches)

Other info: item unique

Find more info about wet felting here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felt

All items are hand crafted in pet and smoke-free environment.
